mapper.select: select id, member_id, create_time, ip, city, login_type from ums_member_login_log where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ums_member_login_log(member_id, create_time, ip, city, login_type) values (#{memberId}, #{createTime}, #{ip}, #{city}, #{loginType})

insert into ums_member_login_log(member_id, create_time, ip, city, login_type) values
(#{entity.memberId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.loginType})

insert into ums_member_login_log(member_id, create_time, ip, city, login_type) values
(#{entity.memberId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.loginType})
on duplicate key update member_id = values(member_id), create_time = values(create_time), ip = values(ip), city = values(city), login_type = values(login_type)
mapper.update:
update ums_member_login_log
member_id = #{memberId},
create_time = #{createTime},
ip = #{ip},
city = #{city},
login_type = #{loginType},
where id = #{id}
